greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of arrangements of rooks with rotational symmetry on a triangular grid with n grid points on each side and no two rooks on the same row, column or diagonal.
example: The four cases for n = 4 are:
o   o           o   o           X   o           o   X
o   o   o       o   X   o       o   o   X       X   o   o
o   o   o   o   o   o   o   o   o   X   o   o   o   o   X   o
program: if (not x in c) and (not y in c) and (not z in c):
c1 = [c for c in c0 if not n//3 in c]
results.author: _Andrew Howroyd_, Sep 12 2019
